Imparting teacher training is directly related to raising teaching performance and ensuring that teachers perform at their best which in turn is related to enhanced student learning.
Imparting training in piece-meals will not serve the purpose if not supplemented with continuous evaluation of teachers followed by feedback.
From the perspective to maintain and raise educational standards, effective monitoring and evaluation of teaching thus becomes imperative.
Evaluation of teachers can have two specific purposes/functions :-
1.Improvement function 2.Accountability function

~To improve quality of instruction and contribute to the successful achievement of the goals and objectives defined in the educational plan (benchmarking teacher quality) 

~To assess the effectiveness and competence of the teachers 

~To assess the strengths of the teachers 

~To identify areas in the need of improvement 

~To provide support, mentoring and training 

~To assure continued professional growth
